==Descriptions==
{{Description|Stretching eastward from [[Windrise]] to the sea, Falcon Coast &mdash; together with [[Cape Oath]] &mdash; shelters the sea from three sides, creating a bay that sits east of Mondstadt.<br />Given the long coastline and shallow waters, citizens of Mondstadt often come here to enjoy a nice stroll. On occasion, you can see falcons soaring high above the blue waves that brush upon the white sand.|[https://genshin.hoyoverse.com/en/map Expedition], Genshin Impact Official Site}}
